attributes.action: Reduce International university student tuition fees by £5000.
attributes.additional_details: International students in no doubt pay really high tuition. The pandemic has crippled the economy of even the strongest countries how much more students who come from weaker economies to study in the UK. It is important that this petition be considered as finances continue to impacted which has led to students fleeing the country back to their homes only to continue paying full tuition fees for online classes or remote study. This debate should focus strongly on International students.
attributes.background: Government should hold debates in Parliament between international students and the MPs to raise/discuss issues that affect them. International students will voice their opinion and concerns about the tuition fees which they are paying in full during a pandemic that affects the whole world.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
